title: AI Interview Help Website
summary: Full-stack hackathon project that used GPT-3.5 to simulate mock interviews and provide personalized feedback.

description.situation: Technical interviews can be intimidating, especially without feedback or preparation tools.
description.task: I set out to build an AI-powered mock interview assistant that could simulate real questions and provide coaching.
description.action: Using large language models and a custom React frontend, I designed an interactive chat experience with feedback and scenario prompts.
description.result: The tool helped users prepare more confidently and gave me experience working with conversational AI UX patterns.

challenges: Linking Java Spring with a real-time frontend chat interface.
Using GPT-3.5 reliably despite API rate limits and output quirks.
Encountered Kubernetes deployment issues due to a Docker bug.
contributions: Built chatbox UI and connected it to Java backend endpoints.
Integrated GPT-3.5 API with custom formatting and error handling.
Led backend testing and MongoDB model design.
